definition: G7, the group of 7 industrialized countries: US, Japan, Britain, Germany, France, Italy and Canada (now G8, including Russia)
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
Group of 77, loose alliance of developing countries, founded in 1964
pinyin: Qi1 shi2 qi1 Guo2 Ji2 tuan2

definition: G7, the group of 7 industrialized countries: US, Japan, Britain, Germany, France, Italy and Canada (now G8, including Russia)
pinyin: Gong1 ye4 Qi1 guo2 Ji2 tuan2

sentences.english: For China's leaders the Party Congress is much more important than the G7.
sentences.chinese: 對中國領導人而言，十七大遠比七國集團會議重要。

sentences.english: In 2003 average short-term interest rates in the G7 economies fell to their lowest in recorded history.
sentences.chinese: 2003年七國集團平均的短期利率降到了歷史最低。
